description: The function should return the nth element in the Fibonacci sequence.

prompts.prompt: There is code that contains a logic error. May you fix the logic error? The function should return the nth element in the Fibonacci sequence. def fibonacci(n): if n <= 0: return "Invalid input" elif n == 1: return 0 + 1 elif n == 2: return 1 + 1 else: return fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2)
